name: I Am Your Nightmare
description:
This game was made by 2 people in a 2-days-GameJam.

It has mixed 3D and 2D assets, wich gives him a unique aspect.

It´s a competitive game for 2 people on the same PC.

One player handle the mouse, throwing nightmares to the other player, wich handle WASD to dodge them. Also, both players have special abilities that improve your performance and/or make the other player hard to play.
